question: Will you be able to pay for speakers travel?
answer: We would advise you to first let us know what is the title/subject of your talk before we make a decision on paying for travel and accommodation.

question: Do you have a code of conduct
answer: Check our Code of Conduct page

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: Refunds permitted until 28th of December for the very early birds, tickets are fully transferrable to another attendee until the day prior to the event.

question: Do I get a free workshop with my ticket?
answer: No you have to get your workshop seperately. Workshops tickets will be given seperately.

question: Coronavirus update
answer:
Due to the international health and safety concerns and travel restrictions because of the coronavirus situation, we have decided to move the event to the 14th of September. 

As our conference has speakers and attendees flying from across the globe, we were forced to make the difficult yet necessary of postponing the event. 

In case you cannot make the new date let us know and we will process a refund by email cityjsconf@gmail.com

question: Do I get a free ticket for the Private Online Event?
answer:
If you have purchased a ticket (Workshop, Combo Workshop, Standard, NewYears and Early Bird) for our postponed March event you automatically get a FREE online ticket. 

You will have access to:

  • Speakers Q/A
  • Speakers Sessions
  • The private lounge area where you can meet the speakers and other attendees and sponsors booths
  • Participate in Sponsors Workshops 

Your venue ticket will automatically move to next year's event. 

Alternatively, if you choose to cancel your ticket you will need to buy a ticket for the private online event.
